TopicTitle: engine heat animation plays in VAB?

Articles.Content:
I followed the emissive tutorial and added an animation for engine heat. It worked great for a while. Now, for some reason, the animation is playing in the vehicle assembly building when I load the part. It also appears "hot" instantly on the launchpad, even with no engines running.

I can only guess I've done something inadvertent in the cfg file as I was tweaking other information. But I have no idea what.
Sounds like your animation name defined in Unity doesn't match the one you're calling in the config.

OK. Naturally as soon as I ask for help, I notice that I have been a complete bonehead. I had multiple copies of the cfg file open, and the last one I closed/saved I had commented out the module for the heat animation.
